scene.title: Parting Ways in Training Room
scene.short_description: Plenorio reveals his transient nature to Kei, who accepts his departure with weary sadness before leaving for her class.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He calmly discusses his plans to leave and use hidden tricks, showing a detached readiness for what comes next.

character.name: Kei
character.reasoning: She expresses understanding and sadness, with subdued movements and a request for a goodbye, indicating resignation.

scene.title: Interrogation Chamber Ultimatum
scene.short_description: Plenorio is summoned by a Proctor and interrogated by Undersecretary Vance, who offers him a choice between containment and cooperation.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He reacts with contempt and defiance, threatening to leave and challenging Vance's authority.

character.name: Vance
character.reasoning: She issues a cold ultimatum, attempting to control Plenorio by revealing knowledge of his secrets and pressuring him.

character.name: Proctor
character.reasoning: He acts as an imposing enforcer, following orders and maintaining a watchful, silent presence.

scene.title: Escape and Dimensional Shift
scene.short_description: Plenorio uses spatial recursion to vanish from the interrogation chamber, leaving Vance and the Proctor in shocked awe.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He smiles evilly and taunts Vance before disappearing, showing pride in his power and disdain for his captors.

character.name: Vance
character.reasoning: She is horrified and awestruck by Plenorio's escape, realizing he was never bluffing and urgently ordering a search.

character.name: Proctor
character.reasoning: He reacts with strain and alarm, noting the wards didn't trigger and showing uncharacteristic shock.

scene.title: Portal Demonstration at Bank
scene.short_description: Plenorio demonstrates his portal magic to Factor Jorren at the Veridis Merchant Bank, securing a business deal.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He calmly demonstrates his power with a portal, showing confidence and ease in negotiating terms.

character.name: Jorren
character.reasoning: He is initially skeptical but becomes intensely interested and eager upon seeing the portal, recognizing its commercial value.

scene.title: Warehouse Portal Proof of Concept
scene.short_description: Plenorio creates a stable portal between two points in a warehouse, impressing Jorren and engineers with his control.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He concentrates to establish the portal, showing effort and pride in his successful demonstration.

character.name: Jorren
character.reasoning: He is pleased and impressed, confirming the proof of concept and moving to discuss further deals.

scene.title: Long-Distance Portal in Fallowfield
scene.short_description: Plenorio creates a portal over twenty-three miles to Fallowfield, astounding Jorren and solidifying their partnership.

character.name: Plenorio
character.reasoning: He exerts significant effort to establish the long-distance portal, showing pride in his achievement and relief upon success.

character.name: Jorren
character.reasoning: He is deeply impressed and recognizes the revolutionary impact of the portal, immediately planning for exclusivity and profit.
